motd_list.title: Birthday update!
motd_list.description: Thank you all for playing for the last year! Enjoy this limited time event: Eat pieces of cake to heal, gain a boost, and unlock the free Birthday Cake Wheels!

motd_list.title: Limited time free wheels!
motd_list.description: Eat 100 pieces of cake to unlock the Birthday Cake Wheels!, they are only unlockable for a limited time, so be fast to keep them forever!

motd_list.title: Limited birthday maps!
motd_list.description: The maps have gotten a temporary overhaul for the Birthday event! Enjoy Alcohol Balloons and cake everywhere!
